title: Environmental Conservation Seminar
transcript: The Environmental Protection Agency will host a public seminar titled "Climate Change Adaptation Strategies for Coastal Communities" next Wednesday at the Riverside Convention Center. Dr. Michael Chen, a leading marine biologist, will present recent findings on sea level rise and its impact on local ecosystems. The presentation begins at 2 PM and includes a forty-minute lecture followed by a Q&A session. Attendees will receive comprehensive resource materials and access to online databases for further research. Registration is mandatory due to limited seating capacity of 150 participants. Light refreshments will be served during the networking session from 4 to 5 PM. The event is free, but advance booking is essential through the EPA website.
